declaration.code: init?(_ descriptor: NSSortDescriptor, comparing comparedType: Compared.Type) where Compared : NSObject

overview:
## Discussion

Returns `nil` if there isn’t a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] equivalent to the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] you specify, or if the selector to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] isn’t one of the standard string comparison algorithms or `compare(_:)`.

The comparison for the created [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] uses the selector to the associated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] directly, so in cases where the comparison of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] might crash, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] comparison crashes as well.

# init(_:comparing:)

**Initializer**

Creates a sort descriptor using a sort descriptor and a type that you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(_ descriptor: NSSortDescriptor, comparing comparedType: Compared.Type) where Compared : NSObject
```

## Parameters

- **descriptor**: A sort descriptor.
- **comparedType**: The type that the sort descriptor compares.

## Discussion

Returns `nil` if there isn’t a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] equivalent to the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] you specify, or if the selector to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] isn’t one of the standard string comparison algorithms or `compare(_:)`.

The comparison for the created [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] uses the selector to the associated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] directly, so in cases where the comparison of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] might crash, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] comparison crashes as well.
title: init(_:comparing:)
